title: Bro, even Tesla doors lock themselves.

Lock your screen before you get tangled up

Y U NO LOCK YOUR SCREEN
One does not simply leave your screen unlocked.

If you forget to lock your screen, you're gonna have a bad time!

Gollum is disappointed that you forgot to put your precious lock on the screen, my precious!
